name.gano.worldwind.layers.Earth
Class ECIRenderableLayer

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.avlist.AVListImpl
      gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObjectImpl
          gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.AbstractLayer
              gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.RenderableLayer
                  name.gano.worldwind.layers.Earth.ECIRenderableLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
gov.nasa.worldwind.avlist.AVList, gov.nasa.worldwind.Disposable, gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.Layer, gov.nasa.worldwind.Restorable, gov.nasa.worldwind.WWObject, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class ECIRenderableLayer
extends gov.nasa.worldwind.layers.RenderableLayer

This layer automatically rotates its collection of renderables so that their coordinates are plotted in ECI coordinates based on current time (MDJ).
Note: Because of the JOGL coordinate system is different than the ECI (e.g. J2000.0) coordinate system the renderables added to this collection should plot the ECI coordinates (x,y,z) as ( -x, z, y) For example: gl.glVertex3d( -x, z , y);

!!Precession and Nutation are not yet accouted for.

Shawn E. Gano
Created on October 12, 2007 - update May 5 2008
